name: Adobe Acrobat和Reader存在逻辑缺陷漏洞
product: ["Adobe Acrobat DC (Continuous) <=2020.006.20042", "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC (Continuous) <=2020.006.20042", "Adobe Acrobat 2017 (Classic 2017) <=2017.011.30166", "Adobe Acrobat Reader 2017 (Classic 2017) <=2017.011.30166", "Adobe Acrobat 2015 (Classic 2015) <=2015.006.30518", "Adobe Acrobat Reader 2015 (Classic 2015) <=2015.006.30518"]
description: Adobe Acrobat和Reader都是美国奥多比（Adobe）公司的产品。Adobe Acrobat是一套PDF文件编辑和转换工具。Reader是一套PDF文档阅读软件。Adobe Acrobat和Reader存在逻辑缺陷漏洞。攻击者可利用漏洞绕过安全功能，执行任意代码。
solution:
用户可参考如下供应商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：
https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/acrobat/apsb20-24.html
patch: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC for macOS 存在逻辑缺陷漏洞
